actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution urging the President to deny to any country granting sanctuary to international terrorists the benefits of designation as a beneficiary developing country under the General System of Preferences of the Trade Act of 1974.

summary.text: Urges the President to deny to any country granting sanctuary or aid to international terrorists the benefits of designation as a beneficiary developing country as relates to the Generalized System of Preferences and duty-free treatment for eligible articles.

titles.title: A resolution urging the President to deny to any country granting sanctuary to international terrorists the benefits of designation as a beneficiary developing country under the General System of Preferences of the Trade Act of 1974.
